price: 15. Tokkel too maxcol sinni abaaraanaah, tet gacan- gacsaanamak makatinnon, yirgiqeeniih orbisen buqreh (darqi kinnuk) inna ken abba haynam fanah, rabeeh bargeeh angoyyi sinni mara ken abne.
arabic: فَمَا زَالَت تِّلۡكَ دَعۡوَىٰهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ جَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ حَصِيدًا خَٰمِدِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: famā zālat til'ka daʿwāhum ḥattā jaʿalnāhum ḥaṣīdan khāmidīna
